mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College's football team for 1922 was runner-up for the city championship. Team members were: Back row (L to R): Malcolm Monteverde, William Condon, H. Pelegrin, Ed Kuhn, Kordell Linder, Carrigan, Pat Johnson, Coach Backereg. Middle row (L to R): G. Clawson, T.P. Manigan, Shelby Schneider, Claude Pfeiffer, Joe Kisber, Horace Werne, Tom Clarke, uknown. Front row (L to R): J. Stucks Reilly, J. Cummings, Chris Arnoult, Dick Ward, Jef Gros, Pete Manigan, Roswell Hale.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
